Gold was widely heralded as one of the leading and most respected voices in food criticism, and his annual 101 Best Restaurants list was a testament to the amazing amount of ground he covered.Gold received the Pulitzer Prize in 2007 for his work at LA Weekly—he is the only food critic who has received the prestigious award. In 2016, Gold was the subject of the documentary film City of Gold which offered a glimpse into Gold's world as a restaurant critic.
